Metadata.description: Fast, modern browser-based MBOX file viewer. Upload and view email archives instantly.

hero.title: View Your MBOX Files
hero.description: A modern, fast, and intuitive browser-based MBOX file viewer. Open, search, and explore your email archives in seconds.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized for performance and loading of large MBOX files

features.title: Easy to Use
features.description: Intuitive interface designed for effortless file navigation

features.title: Email Archive
features.description: Perfect for viewing and managing email export archives

cta.title: Get Started
cta.description: No installation required. Works entirely in your browser.

footer.description: MBOX Viewer. Open source and free to use.

noFiles.title: No files loaded
noFiles.description: Drop an MBOX file or click to get started.
noFiles.uploadingDescription: Please wait for the file to be scanned.

input.drop: Drop one or more MBOX files here
input.noMessages: No messages found in this file.
input.partialFailure: {count, plural, =1 {1 file could not be imported} other {# files could not be imported}}
input.invalidType: {count, plural, =1 {Unsupported file type. Please select an MBOX file.} other {Some files have unsupported types. Please select MBOX files only.}}
input.samplesDescription: Load two built-in sample MBOX files to test search, preview, and export features instantly.

search.labelFiltersSummary: Label filters, {controlsCount, plural, =1 {# control} other {# controls}}. {optionsCount, plural, =1 {# option available} other {# options available}}.
search.labelFiltersSummaryActive: Label filters, {controlsCount, plural, =1 {# control} other {# controls}}. {optionsCount, plural, =1 {# option available} other {# options available}}. Active filter: {label}.
search.moreLabels: +{count, plural, =1 {# more label} other {# more labels}}
search.moreLabelsAria: Show {count, plural, =1 {# more label} other {# more labels}}
search.moreLabelsAriaActive: Show {count, plural, =1 {# more label} other {# more labels}}. Active filter: {label}.
search.moreLabelsMenuLabel: Additional labels menu, {count, plural, =1 {# item} other {# items}}
search.moreLabelsMenuLabelActive: Additional labels menu, {count, plural, =1 {# item} other {# items}}. Active filter: {label}.

selection.actionsAriaLabel: {count, plural, =0 {Selection actions. No messages selected} =1 {Selection actions. # message selected} other {Selection actions. # messages selected}}
selection.selectedCount: {count, plural, =0 {No messages selected} =1 {# message selected} other {# messages selected}}

shortcuts.title: Selection shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Use these shortcuts to select and clear messages faster.
shortcuts.jumpLabelsAndMenuItems: jump to first or last visible label filter or open menu item

export.title: Export selected messages
export.description: Export {count, plural, =1 {# selected message} other {# selected messages}}.
export.includeAttachmentsHint: Attachments are packaged in a ZIP archive together with the exported file.
export.success: {count, plural, =1 {Export completed for # message} other {Export completed for # messages}}
export.fileUnavailable: The selected file is no longer available for export

preview.subject: Subject
preview.attachmentPreviewNotAvailableDescription: This file type cannot be previewed. Please download the file to view it.

delete.title: Delete file
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

commandPalette.title: Command Palette
commandPalette.description: Search for a command to run...

attachmentsCenter.title: Attachments Center
attachmentsCenter.description: Browse all attachments in the current file.
attachmentsCenter.noAttachments: No attachments found in this file.
attachmentsCenter.resultsCount: {count, plural, =1 {# attachment found} other {# attachments found}}

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the application

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
analytics.enableTrackingDescription: Allow anonymous usage analytics to help improve the application
analytics.dataCollected: We only track the number of files uploaded and the amount of messages they contain. No personal information, file content, or file names are collected.

Offline.title: You are offline
Offline.description: The network is currently unavailable. You can try reopening the viewer once your connection is restored.
